h2_title: Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide
content: However, if you notice him swap to a reverse grip for his sword early on while leaning his head back, he'll quickly launch out a poison spray in a wide arc you'll need to quickly dodge behind him, or be ready to pop an antimiasma pill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hundred-Eyed_Daoist_Master.md', within the main section titled 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master', specifically from the subsection 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
However, if you notice him swap to a reverse grip for his sword early on while leaning his head back, he'll quickly launch out a poison spray in a wide arc you'll need to quickly dodge behind him, or be ready to pop an antimiasma pill.
